pages.about-us: About Us - BlueHorizon Hotel Resort - Our Commitment to Excellence BlueHorizon HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact ABOUT BLUEHORIZON At BlueHorizon Hotel Resort, we are dedicated to providing an exceptional hospitality experience. With a focus on luxury, comfort, and guest satisfaction, we aim to redefine the resort experience. Our mission is to create memorable and enriching experiences for our guests by offering top-notch accommodations, outstanding service, and a range of world-class amenities. We believe in exceeding expectations and making every stay unforgettable. Our Values Excellence: We strive for excellence in all aspects of our operations, ensuring the highest standards of service and hospitality. Quality: We are committed to providing top-quality accommodations and amenities, ensuring a luxurious and comfortable stay for our guests. Guest Satisfaction: We prioritize guest satisfaction by offering personalized service and addressing the unique needs of each guest. Integrity: We conduct business with integrity, honesty, and transparency, earning the trust and respect of our guests, partners, and employees. Community: We believe in giving back to the community and strive to make a positive impact through various social responsibility initiatives. A PLACE FOR UNFORGETTABLE MEMORIES Discover the perfect escape to enhance your life with BlueHorizon Hotel Resort. EXPLORE ROOMS The BlueHorizon Experience Welcome to BlueHorizon Hotel Resort, where luxury meets tranquility! Discover the perfect blend of exquisite accommodations and breathtaking views. Let's redefine your hospitality experience together. Our Amenities Explore our diverse range of top-notch amenities at BlueHorizon. Whether you seek relaxation, adventure, or exquisite dining, we have the perfect amenities to meet your desires. Our Hospitality Experience unparalleled hospitality at BlueHorizon. Our resort is designed to provide exceptional comfort, service, and style. Let's embark on a journey of luxurious indulgence together. CELEBRATE UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS Discover and join us in celebrating the best of BlueHorizon Hotel Resort. Stay updated on our upcoming events and activities, and be a part of the unforgettable experiences at BlueHorizon. WHY CHOOSE BLUEHORIZON? Explore the top features that make BlueHorizon Hotel Resort stand out. Our commitment to luxury, comfort, and exceptional service ensures you get the best hospitality experience. Luxury Accommodations BlueHorizon offers exquisitely designed rooms and suites that provide the ultimate in comfort and elegance for a perfect stay. World-Class Amenities Enjoy a range of world-class amenities, including a spa, fitness center, and gourmet dining options that cater to all your needs. Stunning Locations Our resort is situated in breathtaking locations that offer spectacular views and easy access to local attractions and activities. Exceptional Service Experience exceptional service with our dedicated staff committed to making your stay memorable and enjoyable. pages.disclaimers: BlueHorizon Hotel Resort - Disclaimers and Policies BlueHorizon HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Important Disclaimers Understanding Our Website Content The information presented on this website is intended for general purposes only. While BlueHorizon Hotel Resort strives to maintain accurate and up-to-date information, we make no guarantees, expressed or implied, regarding the website's completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability. This includes the information, products, services, and related graphics presented here. Any reliance on such information is entirely at your own discretion and risk. External Links This website may contain links to external websites that are not operated, maintained by, or affiliated with BlueHorizon Hotel Resort. It's important to note that we cannot guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information found on these external websites. Limitations of Responsibility BlueHorizon Hotel Resort, its employees, partners, and affiliates will not be held liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages. This includes, but is not limited to, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses arising from: (i) your access to, use of, or inability to access or use the website; (ii) any conduct or content of third parties on the website; (iii) any content obtained from the website; and (iv) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content. This applies regardless of the legal theory used (warranty, contract, tort including negligence) and even if we were informed of the possibility of such damage. Additionally, this applies even if a remedy set forth herein is found to have failed of its essential purpose. Updates to Disclaimers We reserve the right to modify or replace these disclaimers at any time, at our sole discretion. If changes are made, the updated disclaimers will be posted on the website. Your continued use of the website after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new disclaimers. The BlueHorizon website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. pages.privacy-policy: BlueHorizon Hotel Resort - Privacy Policy BlueHorizon HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Your Privacy Policy At BlueHorizon Hotel Resort, we prioritize safeguarding the information you entrust to us. This policy outlines how we handle any data collected through our website. Data We Gather We only collect data essential for specific purposes, such as enhancing your experience, facilitating communication, and continually improving our services. Utilizing Your Data The data we collect empowers us to: Deliver, maintain, and optimize our website functionality. Tailor and expand our website to better serve your needs. Gain insights into website usage patterns. Develop innovative services, features, and functionalities. Safeguarding Your Information We understand the importance of protecting your personal information. We utilize industry-standard security measures to safeguard your data. However, it's crucial to remember that no online transmission or electronic storage method is entirely infallible. Therefore, we cannot guarantee absolute security. Updates to This Policy We reserve the right to periodically update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of any changes by publishing the revised policy on this page.
